Adviser Serbia transition mil-civil court system
Legal adviser Nato HQs, e.g. in Kosovo
Sr adviser minister MoD and Chod, DR Congo
Defence adviser ambassador in Serbia (> 4 years)
Leadership in very complicated crisis areas and missions (Kosovo, Iraq and Lebanon)
